allow: Bash(powershell "Get-WmiObject Win32_Process -Filter ''ProcessId=48116 or ProcessId=48080'' | Select-Object ProcessId,CommandLine")

Bash(mkdir -p "x:/Dev/Repo/my/github/SmartTemplate/tmp/out" && cd "x:/Dev/Repo/my/github/SmartTemplate" && st render samples/winforms-card-form/templates/ --data samples/winforms-card-form/data.yaml -o tmp/out/ 2>&1)

Bash(cd "x:/Dev/Repo/my/github/SmartTemplate" && st render "samples/winforms-card-form/templates/{{ entity_name }}Form.cs.tmpl" --data samples/winforms-card-form/data.yaml -o tmp/out/ManStavServisuForm.cs 2>&1)

Bash(cd "x:/Dev/Repo/my/github/SmartTemplate" && rm -rf /tmp/st_out && mkdir /tmp/st_out && dotnet run --project src/SmartTemplate.Cli/ -- render "samples/winforms-moneyerp-cardform/templates/" --data /tmp/test_moneyerp.yaml -o /tmp/st_out/ 2>&1)
